content.body:
## Summary

A framework-agnostic `.crew/` directory has been added to strata for AI-powered 3D asset generation using Meshy API.

## What's Been Added

### Directory Structure

```
.crew/
â”œâ”€â”€ manifest.yaml
â”œâ”€â”€ crews/
â”‚   â””â”€â”€ asset_generator/
â”‚       â””â”€â”€ config/
â”‚           â”œâ”€â”€ agents.yaml
â”‚           â””â”€â”€ tasks.yaml
â””â”€â”€ flows/
    â”œâ”€â”€ __init__.py
    â””â”€â”€ meshy_asset_flow.py
```

### Asset Generator Crew

**Agents:**
- `asset_designer` - Designs 3D assets with detailed prompts
- `animation_director` - Directs rigging and animation
- `qa_reviewer` - Reviews assets for quality

**Tasks:**
- `design_asset` - Create generation prompts
- `direct_animation` - Specify rigging/animation
- `review_asset` - QA review

### MeshyAssetFlow

Full pipeline for generating game-ready 3D assets:
1. **Text-to-3D** - Generate static model from prompt
2. **Rigging** - Add skeleton to model
3. **Animation** - Generate walk, attack animations
4. **Retexturing** - Create color variants
5. **HITL Review** - Human approval

## Usage

### Framework-Agnostic (Auto-detect)

```bash
# Install agentic-crew (pick your framework)
pip install agentic-crew[crewai]    # or [langgraph] or [strands]

# Run the asset generator
agentic-crew run strata asset_generator --input '{"spec": "A fantasy sword with glowing runes"}'
```

### Programmatically

```python
from agentic_crew import discover_packages, get_crew_config, run_crew_auto

packages = discover_packages()
config = get_crew_config(packages["strata"], "asset_generator")

# Works with CrewAI, LangGraph, or Strands - auto-detected!
result = run_crew_auto(config, inputs={
    "spec": "A cute otter character for a fantasy game"
})
```

## Why `.crew` instead of `.crewai`?

The `.crew` directory is **framework-agnostic**. It works with any AI framework that agentic-crew supports:
- CrewAI
- LangGraph  
- AWS Strands

This means strata users can choose their preferred framework without being locked in.

## Integration with vendor-connectors

The MeshyAssetFlow uses `vendor-connectors` for the Meshy API:

```python
from vendor_connectors.meshy.tools import get_tools

# Get Meshy tools for your framework
tools = get_tools()  # Auto-detects framework
```

## Tasks

- [ ] Test MeshyAssetFlow end-to-end
- [ ] Add more asset types (environments, props)
- [ ] Integrate generated assets with strata rendering
- [ ] Add batch generation support

## Related

- agentic-crew: https://github.com/jbcom/agentic-crew
- vendor-connectors (Meshy): https://github.com/jbcom/vendor-connectors
- otterfall (game using strata): https://github.com/jbcom/otterfall

# EPIC: Strata v1.x Feature Roadmap

## Overview

This EPIC tracks all planned features for Strata v1.x releases, organizing work into themed milestones that progressively expand the library's capabilities.

## Current State (v1.0.0)

Strata v1.0.0 was released on 2025-12-08 with:

### âœ… Production-Ready Features
- **Terrain**: SDF-based generation, marching cubes, biomes
- **Water**: Advanced rendering with caustics, foam, waves
- **Sky**: Procedural day/night cycle, weather
- **Vegetation**: GPU-instanced grass, trees, rocks
- **Characters**: Articulated system with procedural animation, fur
- **Particles**: GPU-accelerated emitters
- **Volumetrics**: Fog, underwater effects, god rays
- **Post-Processing**: Bloom, SSAO, color grading, DOF, motion blur
- **Shadows**: Cascaded shadow maps, contact shadows
- **Decals & Billboards**: Projected decals, always-face-camera sprites

### Architecture
- `src/core/` - Pure TypeScript (framework-agnostic)
- `src/components/` - React Three Fiber components
- `src/shaders/` - GLSL shaders
- `src/presets/` - Ready-to-use configurations

### Packages
- `@jbcom/strata` - Main npm package
- `packages/capacitor-plugin` - Capacitor mobile plugin
- `packages/react-native` - React Native bindings
- `packages/docs` - TypeDoc API documentation
- `packages/examples` - Showcase demos

---

## Milestone Roadmap

### v1.1.0 - Surface Materials & Biomes (Q1 2026)
Expand rendering pipeline with specialized surface shaders and complete biome presets.

**Surface Materials (7 issues)**
- #8 Skin/flesh shader with SSS
- #9 Scales shader (reptile, fish, dragon)
- #10 Feathers shader (layered, iridescent)
- #11 Metal shaders (brushed, corroded, chrome)
- #12 Fabric shader (cloth, leather, silk)
- #13 Ice shader (frozen, cracking, melting)
- #14 Slime/goo shader (translucent, dripping)

**Biome Presets (5 issues)**
- #15 Desert biome (dunes, heat shimmer, sand particles)
- #16 Arctic biome (snow, ice, aurora)
- #17 Volcanic biome (lava, ash, ember glow)
- #18 Swamp biome (murky water, fog, hanging moss)
- #19 Ocean biome (coral, kelp, underwater caustics)

---

### v1.2.0 - Creature Archetypes (Q2 2026)
Enable non-humanoid entity animations with specialized locomotion systems.

**Creature Rigs (6 issues)**
- #20 Quadruped rig (dogs, horses, wolves)
- #21 Flying rig (birds, dragons, insects)
- #22 Swimming rig (fish, whales, jellyfish)
- #23 Arthropod rig (spiders, crabs, insects)
- #24 Serpentine rig (snakes, worms, tentacles)
- #25 Swarm/Crowd system (boids, flocking)

---

### v1.3.0 - Player Experience (Q3 2026)
Enhance player immersion with traversal mechanics and audio systems.

**Traversal Systems (3 issues)**
- #26 Climbing system (ladders, walls, ledges)
- #27 Swimming system (surface, underwater)
- #28 Flying/gliding system

**Audio Systems (4 issues)**
- #31 Biome ambience system
- #32 Adaptive music system
- #33 Voice and dialog system
- #34 Reverb zone system

---

### v1.4.0 - Temporal & AI Systems (Q4 2026)
Add time-based world evolution and AI-powered asset generation.

**Temporal Systems (2 issues)**
- #29 Seasonal cycle system
- #30 Aging and decay system

**AI Integration (1 issue)**
- #2 AI-powered 3D asset generation with Meshy

---

## Cross-Cutting Concerns

### Gap Analysis (from GAP-ANALYSIS-SUMMARY.md)
| System | Current | Target |
|--------|---------|--------|
| Steering Behaviors | 95% | 100% |
| Graph/Pathfinding | 0% | 50% |
| Physics | 60% | 85% |
| Postprocessing | 29% | 60% |
| Animation (Clip-based) | 0% | 80% |
| Audio | 70% | 90% |

### Known Issues
- Ragdoll system needs joint connections (Physics)
- GPU wind/LOD props not implemented (Instancing)
- No animation clip controller (Animation)
- No audio buses/mixer (Audio)

---

## Dependencies

Each milestone builds on previous work:
- v1.1 Surface Materials enable v1.2 Creature textures
- v1.2 Creature Archetypes enable diverse NPCs
- v1.3 Audio integrates with v1.1 Biomes
- v1.4 Temporal affects all visual systems

## Success Criteria

- All features have unit tests
- All features have TypeDoc documentation
- All features follow PUBLIC_API.md contract
- CI passes on all PRs
- No regression in existing features

---

## Related Documents
- [PUBLIC_API.md](PUBLIC_API.md) - API contract
- [GAP-ANALYSIS-SUMMARY.md](GAP-ANALYSIS-SUMMARY.md) - Coverage gaps
- [IMPLEMENTATION_STATUS.md](IMPLEMENTATION_STATUS.md) - Current status
- [STRUCTURE.md](STRUCTURE.md) - Architecture
